About me

Few words about me

Hello, my name is Yevhen Abrosimenkov. I'm a front-end developer from Ukraine. In my portfolio, there are few of the sites/web-applications that I've developed.
I believe my strong points are my Creativeness and Punctuality. My №1 goal will always be to meet your needs and deadline. When working on a new project, I like to speak with the client, so that I can have a clear understanding of his/her needs and vision of the project. I'm honest and fair.

My main skills

-HTML (HTML5)
-CSS (SASS/SCSS, LESS)
-JavaScript (ES2015-...)
-Git
-BEM
-Bootstrap
-jQuery

Work Ethic

- I am very proficient at my skills.
- I will communicate with you throughout the entire process, either by email or by Skype.
- I think ahead during every project and will make suggestions that will help you in the long term.
- I will always execute your plan in specific detail and on deadline.

Thank you for request!
